channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Most US adults think individual choices keep people in poverty, new AP-NORC/Harris poll finds
item.description: A new AP-NORC poll finds that most U.S. adults think personal choices are a major driver of poverty and homelessness, while fewer blame a lack of government support.

item.title: Home Depot stores, long a hub for day laborers, now draw immigration agents out on raids
Supreme Court lifts restrictions on LA immigration stops set after agents swept up US citizens
